name: cbox-vault
description: pouchdb-based vault that encrypts/decrypts docs to/from the underlying db

scripts.example: npm run example:bundle && npm run example:serve
scripts.example:bundle: browserify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude rxjs --exclude opgp-service --exclude rx-pouchdb --exclude pouchdb-browser --exclude randomshuffle --exclude randombins --exclude bin-allocator --exclude randombytes --exclude base64-js --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude tslib --exclude debug -t aliasify -t uglifyify -o spec/example/index.js
scripts.example:bundle:watch: watchify spec/example/index.ts -p [ tsify -p spec/example ] --exclude rxjs --exclude opgp-service --exclude rx-pouchdb --exclude pouchdb-browser --exclude randomshuffle --exclude randombins --exclude bin-allocator --exclude randombytes --exclude base64-js --exclude pbkdf2 --exclude tslib --exclude debug -t aliasify -o spec/example/index.js --debug -v
scripts.test:coverage: npm run pretest && karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage -t html && http-server -c-1 -o -p 8888 spec/reports/coverage
scripts.test:ci: karma start spec/karma-coverage.conf.js --single-run && remap-istanbul -i spec/reports/coverage/chrom*/coverage.json -o spec/reports/coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly
scripts.test:web: browserify spec/*.spec.ts -p [ tsify -p spec ] --exclude rxjs --exclude tslib -o spec/web/index.spec.js && npm run test:web:serve
